content: this listing is for a size inclusive crochet top digital pattern this top features a lovely detail of puff hearts throughout the entire garment ribbing is added on both sides for better support which you can either skip or add when creating this piece this pattern comes with an easy to follow written instructions in standard american crochet terms and high definition pictures which will be enjoyed by both advanced beginners and intermediate crochet artists alike this pattern is size inclusive which means you can follow along the written instructions and make this top according to your own body measurements this pattern can be used for any size it also includes time stamps that you can use along with it s accompanying video tutorial on youtube to get you started you can check out the free video tutorial of this top below https //youtu be/sartj-anxqc you will need #1 /superfine/fingering weight yarn i used approximately 68g/204 m/223 yds size e 3 5 mm crochet hook yarn needle scissors tape measure skill level advanced beginner crochet terminology standard us crochet terms what you ll get 9 pages instant download pdf pattern complete with step by step instructions high resolution photos and stitch guides and everything you need to create this garment according to your own body measurements if you have additional questions and inquiries regarding this pattern you can always contact us and we d be delighted to assist your needs
